S06n575:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n575:5: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
S06n575:6: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,
S06n575:9: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā |
S06n575:10: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā |
S06n575:11: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā,
S06n575:12: na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā |
S06n575:13: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā?
S06n575:16: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n575:23: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n575:24: na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n575:25: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n575:26: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06n575:27: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo'bhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n575:29: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
S06n575:47: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva,
S06n575:50: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate?
S06n575:52: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā?
S06n575:54: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā,
S06n575:67: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati?
S06n575:71: tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante,
S06n575:73: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati,
S06n575:76: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati,
S06n575:79: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam?
S06n575:81: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati?
S06n575:82: subhūtirāha-na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate-kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti |
S06n575:88: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati-śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
S06n575:93: avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaśca divasaścokto bhagavatā |
S06n575:94: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n575:95: tato'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam |
S06n575:96: śāriputra āha-yatpunarayuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti,
S06n575:97: kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
S06n575:99: tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā |
S06n575:100: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati,
S06n575:101: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā |
S06n575:102: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?
S06n575:103: sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati-aho hataḥ,
S06n575:108: śāriputra āha-sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati-aho hataḥ,
S06n575:112: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
S06n575:114: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet?
S06n575:118: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
S06n575:127: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā,
S06n575:129: śāriputra āha-yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā,
S06n575:130: tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā?
S06n575:131: subhūtirāha-nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate,
S06n575:140: śāriputra āha-yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06n575:143: subhūtirāha-ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ |
S06n575:148: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha-mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ |
S06n575:151: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha-ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ |
S06n575:153: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti?
S06n575:165: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā,
S06n575:168: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā,
S06n575:178: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
S06n575:180: maitreya āha-na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
S06n575:187: api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta,
S06n575:191: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt-gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06n575:192: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati ||
S06n575:193: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma-kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt-gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
S06n575:194: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato'rhanniti prabhāvyate?
S06n575:196: bhagavānāha-evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n575:207: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06n575:211: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya |
S06n575:217: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:220: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06n575:225: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena |
S06n575:230: teṣāmapi ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam |
S06n575:231: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati |
S06n575:235: yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇyapi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:238: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:240: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:243: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam-sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam |
S06n575:249: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam-aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,
S06n575:253: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:257: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06n575:258: yathā vīryapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti ||
S06n575:259: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:260: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ-tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,
S06n575:262: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:264: sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ |
S06n575:266: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati,
S06n575:268: tattadeva prādurbhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasaiva sarvamutpadyate,
S06n575:269: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ manasaiva sarvaṃ prādurbhaviṣyati,
S06n575:272: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06n575:273: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvadā,
S06n575:274: tathā ca svacittapariśuddhaye vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06n575:275: yathā dhyānapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti ||
S06n575:276: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:277: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam-neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate,
S06n575:280: na cotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:281: na ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:285: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena [na] duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā-bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti,
S06n575:287: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam |
S06n575:288: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaśca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06n575:289: jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti |
S06n575:290: evaṃ ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ-tathā kariṣyāmi,
S06n575:292: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarvasattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvavyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:296: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06n575:297: yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti ||
S06n575:298: atha khalu tatra parṣadi anyatarā strī saṃnipatitā saṃniṣaṇṇābhūt |
S06n575:299: sā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi,
S06n575:302: anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti |
S06n575:303: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot |
S06n575:304: tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata |
S06n575:305: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat |
S06n575:306: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan ||
S06n575:307: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06n575:309: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti |
S06n575:310: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S06n575:313: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate |
S06n575:314: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati |
S06n575:315: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena |
S06n575:318: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet,
S06n575:320: sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
S06n575:321: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati |
S06n575:322: tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddharbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate ||
S06n575:323: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt-ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:325: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-evametadānanda, evametat |
S06n575:327: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti |
S06n575:329: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati |
S06n575:331: tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam |
S06n575:332: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti |
S06n575:333: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:334: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti |
S06n575:335: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:337: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya imānyevaṃrūpāṇi bhayabhairavakāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ tadānīṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n575:339: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n575:340: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06n575:342: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā |
S06n575:344: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06n575:345: tato'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti |
S06n575:346: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi-aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n575:347: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n575:348: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n575:350: evametat yathā vadasi-kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti ||
